channel.title: Title Box
channel.description:
How can I move my title box so it matches the picture from the title menu. Also the titlebox picture you see here is smaller than the actual one.
[img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/4247/unledfop.png[/img]
ps. If you know how to remove the flames on Galkon's Refactored can you let me know. Haven't researched in removing that yet.

item.title: Title Box
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

ok, so theres no way you can move/resize the titlebox. Can you at least move the letters so it can fit on the background title? For example move the username so it can fit on the username box?

Read full topic

you hide server name because you leech haha ;D

item.title: Title Box

item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

If you made this, you probably will gave the photoshop file still (if that’s what you used), and if that’s the case, it would probably just be easier to redo the log-in box.

Read full topic
